snippet.title: Scorched Earth | Official Event Trailer | Hunt: Showdown 1896
snippet.description:
Reports of burned crops and scorched cattle were starting to cause unrest in the northern mountains. Coupled with the sickness that had started to spread, people's homes became fortresses. Lucky, really, considering the heated battle that was about to unfold...

Our latest event, Scorched Earth, arrives August 15th. Take a look at our brand-new reveal trailer.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Get Hunt Showdown on Steam: https://tinyurl.com/HuntSteamYouTube

Make Them Bleed by Port Sulphur Band. Listen here
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UiO-DVP8AGg

Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/huntshowdown
